review: Went for a consultation. Had a sever pain in the tooth next to the one I got extracted few weeks back. Doctor was soft spoken and explained the details very nicely.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went with my wife and we were assigned Dr.Resmi Prakash. ( Before i proceed, The clinic was so clean and very well maintained with simple but elegant decor. ) Dr examined and told me the state of health and what she will perform now and immediately got the scaling done. Usually with other dentists you need to spit out every 3-4 mins but Dr.Resmi ensured that with her assistant and suction only once after entire lower set was completed and same for upper. This saved time and inconvenience to the patient. Same for my wife she quickly took x-rays and gave her the right treatment efficiently. The whole experience was so smooth and professional. Thank you Dr.Resmi Prakash and Dr.Minty Sharma for the efficient treatment and hospitality.
reply_text:
Dear sir ,
I wanted to express my heartfelt appreciation for the wonderful review you shared about your recent dental experience. Your kind words mean a great deal to our dental team.

Our dedicated team of dental professionals works tirelessly to ensure that each visit is met with personalized care and attention. We are truly grateful for the opportunity to serve you and appreciate your confidence in us.
Thank you üòä

review: My son having pain from few days so I consulted dr Minty Sharma. I have deep cavities so dr advised root canal. I went for the procedure now I am happy with my treatment. Dr also explained very nicely and showed the brushing technique. I like the dr friendliness and the quality treatment.

Our experience with the staff and doctor was really amazing. They are quite helpful and listen to you carefully and treat accordingly. Would like to specially mention Dr.  Vinita shah for being so vulnerable and friendly during treatment

context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Teeth Reshaping,Zirconia Crowns,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
All of a sudden I had extreme pain in my teeth while eating hot\cold stuff.
Initially I was very afraid as I already had bridges in those teeth and was not sure if bridges could be removed.
Doctor very patiently looked at issue and explained me the root cause of pain.
After removing the bridges, one teeth was rotten and was not sure if it could be saved or not..But Doctor treated it and ensured that its back to normal.
Its a week now and I am very happy for the treatment received.
reply_text: Thank you So much for your valuable feedback sir .üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been consulting Dr Minty Sharma, Smiles Dental Studio ‚Äì HSR  for more than half a decade. Dr treated me few root canal surgery and fillings. Dr patiently listen to the problem, analyse it and give right set of suggestion/treatment.   Dr make sure patient is very comfortable during the treatment.  In fact, she gave me antacid syrup as there was a gastritis that was causing some pain. Root canal was done without much of pain.

Appointment slot is rightly managed. Clinic hygiene is good and highly maintained. Hospital staff are friendly and co-operative.  I am extremely satisfied and had pleasant experience. I will *strongly* recommend Dr Minty Sharma, Smiles Dental Studio ‚Äì HSR   for Dental consultation treatment.
